plugins.description: Manage application plugins, control plugin permissions and status

skills.title: Skill Management
skills.description: Manage Agent skills, enable or disable skills

commands.description: Manage registered slash commands, enable or disable commands
commands.filterLabel: Filter command messages from LLM context

provider.title: LLM Provider
provider.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Provider instance?

openai.name: OpenAI / Compatible API
openai.description: Supports OpenAI API and all compatible interfaces (DeepSeek, Moonshot, Groq, SiliconFlow, etc.)

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.description: API key from OpenAI or compatible provider

stream.label: Streaming Output
stream.description: When enabled, LLM responses will be displayed token by token for faster perceived response. When disabled, the full response is shown at once

supportsVision.label: Vision
supportsVision.description: Model supports image input (Vision). When enabled, images from tool results are sent directly to the model; otherwise auto-transcribed to text

supportsFile.label: File
supportsFile.description: Model supports file input (e.g. PDF, documents)

supportsToolCalling.label: Tool Calling
supportsToolCalling.description: Model supports Function Calling / Tool Use. When disabled, tool definitions will not be sent to the model

deepseek.name: DeepSeek
deepseek.description: DeepSeek official API with deepseek-chat and deepseek-reasoner models, 128K context, Function Calling support

baseUrl.label: API Base URL
baseUrl.description: DeepSeek API address, usually no need to change

model.label: Model
model.description: Enter model ID, e.g. deepseek-chat (general), deepseek-reasoner (complex reasoning)

timeout.label: Timeout (seconds)
timeout.description: Request timeout, consider increasing for reasoner model

tts.title: TTS Provider
tts.empty: No TTS instances yet. Click the button above to add one.
tts.setPrimary: Click to set as primary TTS
tts.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this TTS instance?

fish-audio.name: Fish Audio
fish-audio.description: High-quality AI speech synthesis with 400+ pre-built voices, custom voice cloning, streaming, emotion tags, multi-language

voiceId.label: Voice ID
voiceId.description: Voice model ID, find at https://fish.audio/discovery. Leave empty for default voice

model.label: TTS Model
model.description: Enter model ID, e.g. s1, speech-1.6, speech-1.5

edge-tts.name: Edge TTS
edge-tts.description: Microsoft Edge free TTS, supports multiple languages, natural sounding

openai-tts.name: OpenAI TTS
openai-tts.description: OpenAI Speech API, 6 preset voices, high quality (tts-1-hd) and low latency (tts-1) modes. Supports compatible services

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.description: API Key from OpenAI or compatible provider

baseUrl.label: API Base URL
baseUrl.description: API Endpoint. Change for compatible services

voiceId.label: Voice
voiceId.description: Select voice. Custom voice ID supported

model.label: TTS Model
model.description: Enter model ID, e.g. tts-1 (low latency), tts-1-hd (high quality)

elevenlabs.name: ElevenLabs
elevenlabs.description: Leading AI speech synthesis, 29+ languages, voice cloning, high quality, streaming support

voiceId.label: Voice ID
voiceId.description: Voice ID from https://elevenlabs.io/voice-library. Default is George

model.label: TTS Model
model.description: Enter model ID, e.g. eleven_multilingual_v2, eleven_flash_v2_5, eleven_flash_v2

stability.label: Stability
stability.description: Voice stability (0.0 - 1.0). Higher is more stable, lower is more expressive

similarityBoost.label: Similarity Boost
similarityBoost.description: Voice similarity boost (0.0 - 1.0). Higher is closer to original voice

mcp.name: Name
mcp.commandRequired: Command is required for stdio transport
